other: Gains {status:Vibration} Count from using or discarding S1.
S3 can consume 10 {status:Vibration} Count to gain Coin Power and additional {status:Vibration} Count application.
If her passive is active, every {status:VibrationExplosion} deals bonus {keyword:Sloth} damage.

1110501.desc: Upon triggering [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, inflict 30% of Raised Stagger Threshold as Sloth damage (Max 20; rounded down)
1110501.name: Drinking Boast

1110521.desc: 1 ally with the most [Vibration] Count gains +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill effects
1110521.name: Carrot & Stick
